name: Yngwie Malmsteen
description: '''Yngwie Johan Malmsteen''' ({{IPAc-en|ˈ|ɪ|ŋ|v|eɪ|_|ˈ|m|ɑː|l|m|s|t|iː|n}}; born '''Lars Johan Yngve Lannerbäck''', {{IPA|sv|lâːʂ ˈjuːhan ˈʏŋvɛ lânːɛrbɛk|lang}} on 30 June 1963) is a Swedish-American guitarist. He first became known in the 1980s for his [[neoclassical metal|neoclassical]] playing style in [[heavy metal music|heavy metal]], and has released 22 studio albums in a career spanning over 40 years.
